post.text: Share this if you agree we need to keep moving forward, not back. hillaryclinton.com/makeaplan

replies.author: Andrew
replies.text: It's awful. I actually prefer Jill Stein but I will vote trump to keep Hillary out

replies.author: Kyle
replies.text: I prefer Stein as well, but voted Hillary to keep out trump. :P we both should of voted stein instead.

replies.author: Andrew
replies.text: It's sad when you have to choose the lesser of two evils
